title: 108_hr1098
content: Congressional Pension Accountability Act - Provides that: (1) all service as a Member of Congress of an individual who is expelled from Congress shall be noncreditable for purposes of determining eligibility for, or the amount of, any annuity which might otherwise be payable out of the Civil Service Retirement and Disability Fund based on such service. (2) all Government contributions to the Thrift Savings Plan for that individual while that individual was performing Member service shall be forfeited. And (3) the portion of such an individual's lump-sum credit which is attributable to such Member service shall be payable to such individual or, if deceased, to the appropriate beneficiary or beneficiaries.
